message: I have been tweeting for years now. But when i hashtag anything it does not show up in the search.twitter.com and type from:surferjoejoe nothing turns up if you type in "from:yourname" everything you tweeted will show up @ # and all but even if i hashtag #convore or @convore it doesn't show. i tried changing my name which was surferjoe2020 to surferjoejoe cause i read in the help that maybe the numbers 2020 caused the non showing of posts. can someone please tell me how to get my tweets on track?
for example, how often do you tweet? and do you often include links to external sites?
ie, you have been placed in the phantom zone
is there a chance you may have engaged in some behavior which caused your account to be marked as questionable or spam?
wow, okay.... i just looked at your twitter stream
i'm fairly certain that your twitter account has been placed in virtual jail
meaning you're in a gray area where they haven't deactivated your account, but have deemed you questionable enough to block you from being searched

@djchall I have a follow up question about it...
How can he get rid of that 'phantom zone'? Is the links to external sites is only the reason for that?

id like to write twitter and complain, i am no threat to anyone, and my tweets are no weapons of mass turbation what kind of kaka is that? ive never owned a gun in my life and dont intend to either, what threat could there be, i refuse to accept that explanation, there must be a glitch somewhere,because from day one i couldnt find my tweets its not like it happened last nite...

does someone have a technical not a phantasmic one and @djchall thank you for your possible reason but it has to be something else im sure its not the phantom zone ..twilight zone maybe but phantomnot...in fact i have never heard of such a place..lemme check...

lol dont feel bad, half of my twitter accounts are in virutal jail as well eg http://www.Twitter.com/LiveMLBchat 
http://www.Twitter.com/LiveNHLchat 
http://www.Twitter.com/LiveNBAchat

Basically you dont show up in #searches any more and nothing you can really do about it unless you suck d1ck :(
@djchall is there anyone else u know that has bin blocked from being searched? that cant be it..

@djchall not at all most of my posts are #rt 's retweets and #motivational #quotes #quote , now if you search #quote or #quotes i do not turn up, i think it may be in my earlier twitter days when i clicked on almost everything and sometimnes wished i hadnt like the get the " lot of followers" one or the rss one ...
